page.title: 10LEISURE PARK AT ALTON TOWERS
page.content: The picnic area at Oakamoor,the beaut- iful walks and leisure drives bring people in their thousands to this part of the Churnet Valley.But most of all, Alton Towers attracted 2 million visit- ors last year.They came in 300 thousand cars and 30 thousand coaches.It opens a fortnight before Easter to 31st October Up to 1000 people are employed in the high season,about 400 throughout the rest of the year.There are 3 world- class attractions,The Black Hole, Log- Flume and Corkscrew.Other attractions are live entertainment,exhibitions, cinemas,the theatre,shows,circus,themed street,magnificent gardens with follies and the Towers buildings.There are 5 main restaurants and 30 kiosks.All the attractions,about 80 altogether,are included in the the entrance price of 4.99. People come to Alton Towers from all over the world.
